TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LosFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 序列化 Web 窗体页的视图状态。

span.span: Serializes the view state for a Web Forms page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受限的对象序列化 (LOS) 格式化程序专为高 compact ASCII 格式序列化。The limited object serialization (LOS) formatter is designed for highly compact ASCII format serialization. 此类支持序列化的任何对象图，但针对那些包含字符串、 数组和哈希表进行了优化。This class supports serializing any object graph, but is optimized for those containing strings, arrays, and hash tables. 它提供了多个.NET Framework 基元类型的第二个顺序优化。It offers second order optimization for many of the .NET Framework primitive types. 这是专用的格式，仅为 Web 请求的生存期保持一致。This is a private format and remains consistent only for the lifetime of a Web request.

summary.span: 将指定的视图状态值转换为有限对象序列化 (LOS) 格式的对象。

span.span: Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

param.span: 包含要转换的视图状态值的 。

span.span: A that contains the view-state value to transform.

summary.span: 将 对象中包含的视图状态值转换为有限对象序列化 (LOS) 格式的对象。

span.span: Transforms the view-state value contained in a object to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.
A LOS-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法用于转换中包含的视图状态值为 LOS 格式的对象的对象。This version of the method is used to transform the view-state value contained in a object to a LOS-formatted object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

summary.span: 将指定的视图状态值转换为有限对象序列化 (LOS) 格式的对象。

span.span: Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.
A LOS-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法用于转换为 LOS 格式的对象指定的视图状态值。This version of the method is used to transform the specified view-state value to a LOS-formatted object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: The view state is invalid.

summary.span: 将有限对象序列化 (LOS) 格式的对象转换为视图状态值。

span.span: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (System.IO.Stream stream, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream stream, object value) cil managed
public: void Serialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The to receive the transformed value.

param.name: value
param.span: 要转换为视图状态值的 LOS 格式的对象。

span.span: The LOS-formatted object to transform into a view-state value.

summary.span: 将有限对象序列化 (LOS) 格式的对象转换为视图状态值并将结果放置在 对象中。

span.span: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法用于将 LOS 格式的对象转换为一个视图状态的值。This version of the method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. 然后将结果放入对象。The results are then placed into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法用于将 LOS 格式的对象转换为一个视图状态的值。This version of the method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. 然后将结果放入对象。The results are then placed into a object.
